April 30, 1972 D Blackpool Contest, 'B' Section
Blackpool Contest (B Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Blackpool Contest blackpool-contest-b-section
Locarno Ballroom, Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK 1st Prize - £30 2nd Prize - £15 3rd Prize - £10 Award for best Soprano to Brian Evans, British Vita.
Oct. 28, 2011, 6:25 p.m. Nov. 28, 2016, 11:54 a.m.
